title: Insurers' new business: 'active shooter' policies for U.S. schools
text:
Insurers' new business: 'active shooter' policies for U.S. schools 5:48am EDT - 02:16 
The deadly school shootings in Sandy Hook, Connecticut and Parkland, Florida, among others, have prompted a growing number of education officials to purchase 'active shooter insurance' policies similar to those purchased by malls and movie theaters. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The deadly school shootings in Sandy Hook, Connecticut and Parkland, Florida, among others, have prompted a growing number of education officials to purchase 'active shooter insurance' policies similar to those purchased by malls and movie theaters.
